description: This file defines an API router for executing test cases, including a POST endpoint that triggers execution of one or more test cases with relevant request and response schemas.

methods.name: execute_tests( execute_data: ExecuteRequest, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Async function to handle execution of test cases based on the provided request data, managing background tasks, database sessions, and user context.

ctags.name: execute_tests
ctags.signature: ( execute_data: ExecuteRequest, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
